hierarchy.lvl1: This talk shows how quick and simple it can be to write end-to-end tests for web applications – if your testing tools are not fighting you all the time. I will go over writing E2E tests using Cypress.io (https://www.cypress.io/), controlling the network during tests, using visual testing and setting up continuous integration to perform E2E tests on each commit.

hierarchy.lvl1: This talk shows how quick and simple it can be to write end-to-end tests for web applications – if your testing tools are not fighting you all the time. I will go over writing E2E tests using Cypress.io (https://www.cypress.io/), controlling the network during tests, using visual testing and setting up continuous integration to perform E2E tests on each commit.
